snippet: There has been a gradual decline in the number of terrorist attacks since the 1970s, according to the Global Terrorism Database.
abstract: Bombing of Boston Marathon ends more than decade in which United States experienced strikingly few terrorist attacks, in part due to far more aggressive law enforcement tactics that arose after September 11, 2001.
lead_paragraph: There has been a gradual decline in the number of terrorist attacks since the 1970s, according to the Global Terrorism Database.

headline.seo: Bombings End Decade of Strikingly Few Successful Terrorism Attacks in U.S.
headline.main: Bombings End Decade of Strikingly Few Successful Terrorism Attacks in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Blasts End A Decade Of Terrorism On the Wane
